scripts.alt-demo-test: dotenv -e .env.demolocal next build &&  dotenv -e .env.demolocal npx serve out --single --prefix /
scripts.alt-demo-local-build: rm -rf  out && dotenv -e .env.demolocal -- npm run build && touch ./out/.nojekyll
scripts.alt-demo-prod-build: rm -rf out &&   dotenv -e  .env.demo npm run build   && touch ./out/.nojekyll
scripts.alt-demo-deploy: rm -rf out &&   dotenv -e  .env.demo npm run build   && touch ./out/.nojekyll && gh-pages -d out -t true
scripts.demo-test: rm -rf  gh-pages/out && dotenv -e .env.demolocal -- npm run build && touch ./out/.nojekyll && mv out gh-pages &&  dotenv -e .env.demolocal npx serve  gh-pages --single --prefix /
scripts.demo-local-build: rm -rf  ../gh-pages/out && dotenv -e .env.demolocal -- npm run build && touch ./out/.nojekyll && mv out ../gh-pages
scripts.demo-prep: rm -rf ../gh-pages/out && dotenv -e .env.demo npm run build && mv out ../gh-pages/out && touch ../gh-pages/out/.nojekyll && touch ../gh-pages/.nojekyll
scripts.demo-deploy: rm -rf gh-pages/out && dotenv -e .env.demo npm run build && mv out gh-pages/out && touch ./gh-pages/out/.nojekyll && touch ./gh-pages/.nojekyll && gh-pages -d gh-pages/ -t true
